Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon ="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Script that will be inserted into the target character for damage over time
function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait(1.0) print("Waiting") end print("Found Child") end
waitForChild(script, "Poison") waitForChild(script, "creator") poison = script:FindFirstChild("Poison")
local poisonDuration = poison.Value.Y local poisonDamage = poison.Value.X
print("Poison Tag missing")
tag = script:FindFirstChild("creator") tag.Parent = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
torso = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if torso:FindFirstChild("Smoke") == nil then smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.1 smoke.Size = 0.1 smoke.Color = Color3.new(0.0, 0.9, 0.0) smoke.Parent = torso smoke.Opacity = 0.2 smoke.Enabled = true end
humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
while poisonDuration > 0 do humanoid:TakeDamage(poisonDamage) poisonDuration = poisonDuration - 1 script.Poison.Value = Vector3.new(script.Poison.Value.X, script.Poison.Value.Y - 1, 0) poisonDuration = script.Poison.Value.Y wait(1.0) end
smoke:Remove() tag:Remove()
wait(1.0) script:Remove()

Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true Sword = Tool.Handle
local damage = 5
print("RUNNING SCRIPT")
smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Color = Color3.new(0.0, 0.9, 0.0) smoke.Enabled = true smoke.Size = 0.1 smoke.Opacity = 0.05 smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.0 smoke.Parent = Tool.Handle
local slashSound = Instance.new("Sound") slashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" slashSound.Parent = Sword slashSound.Volume = 1 -- Animations local slashAnim
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm ~= nil then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip ~= nil and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("InsertScript") == nil then newScript = Tool.InsertScript:Clone() creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Parent = newScript newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = hit.Parent else hit.Parent.InsertScript.Poison.Value = Tool.InsertScript.Poison.Value end
tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end function onActivated()
if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.PirateSlash) slashAnim:Play() slashSound:Play() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.4472, 0.8944) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1.0, 0.0, 0.0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, -0.8944, 0.4472) wait(1.0)
Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1.0, 0.0, 0.0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0.0, -1.0, 0.0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
wait(0.75) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if slashSound then slashSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
